document.full_text: a dozen people, including 10 current or former delta air lines baggage handlers, face drug trafficking and related charges in a probe of cocaine and marijuana smuggling, federal officials said on thursday.
document.title: feds arrest 12 in airport drug smuggling probe
lines_and_colors: a dozen people, including 10 current or former delta air lines baggage handlers, face drug trafficking and related charges in a probe of cocaine and marijuana smuggling, federal officials said on thursday.
